description:
Heju is a successful chief manager working at an entertainment agency. She began working in this industry as a manager for Gunwoo, who was a newly-discovered child actor. Years later, Gunwoo is now a young man who has become a very popular actor and model in Korea. 

Heju has always seen Gunwoo only as her client, but one day, Gunwoo confesses his feelings for her…>
